data.quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
data.author: George Edward Woodberry

data.quote: We meet no ordinary people in our lives.
data.author: C.S. Lewis

data.quote: The soul is stronger than its surroundings.
data.author: William James

data.quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
data.author: Neil Armstrong

data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: To be awake is to be alive.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
data.author: Plutarch

data.quote: It's the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison

data.quote: If you want to be happy, be.
data.author: Leo Tolstoy

data.quote: If we all did the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: Friends are as companions on a journey, who ought to aid each other to persevere in the road to a happier life.
data.author: Pythagoras

data.quote: The secret to life is meaningless unless you discover it yourself.
data.author: W. Somerset Maugham

data.quote: We build too many walls and not enough bridges.
data.author: Isaac Newton

data.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
data.author: T. S. Eliot

data.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.
data.author: Billy Graham

data.quote: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quote: Peace begins with a smile.
data.author: Mother Teresa
